standard.description: These tests help support Accessibility standards. They are not substitutes for screen reader tests and other manual tests.

test.test_name: HTML should be correctly configured in IG Cols
test.query_clob:
select case when svt_stds_parser.valid_html_yn(aapic.link_text) = 'N'
            then 'N'
            when svt_stds_parser.valid_html_yn(aapic.heading) = 'N'
            then 'N'
            when aapic.item_type = 'NATIVE_HTML_EXPRESSION'
            then svt_stds_parser.valid_html_yn(aapic.attribute_01) 
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapic.application_id, 
       aapic.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapic.last_updated_by,
       aapic.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) has malformed HTML : `%3`', 
        p0 => aapic.heading, 
        p1 => aapic.application_id,
        p2 => aapic.page_id,
        p3 => aapic.attribute_01) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) has malformed HTML', 
        p0 => aapic.heading, 
        p1 => aapic.application_id,
        p2 => aapic.page_id) issue_title,
       aapic.column_id component_id,
       aapic.parent_column_id parent_component_id,
       aapic.heading,
       aapic.label,
       aapic.item_type,
       aapic.name,
       aapic.attribute_01,
			 aapic.workspace
from apex_appl_page_ig_columns aapic
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapic.page_id and aap.application_id = aapic.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapic.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapic.application_id
where aapic.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation:
HTML that doesn't close tags appropriately is often forgiven by browsers but screen readers can have more trouble. HTML must be checked strictly for appropriately opened and closed tags.

HTML is being checked for matching opening and closing tags. This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  4.1.1(A) : Parsing : In content implemented using markup languages, elements have complete start and end tags, elements are nested according to their specifications, elements do not contain duplicate attributes, and any IDs are unique, except where the specifications allow these features.
